newsitem.title: GERMANY: SAA seeks E. Europe sales agents.
newsitem.headline: SAA seeks E. Europe sales agents.

text.p: South African Airways said it is seeking cargo general sales agents in central and eastern Europe.
Wolfgang Els, the airline's Frankfurt-based Europe cargo manager, said SAA wanted to target the expanding eastern Europe airfreight market through sales representatives.
"At present I am looking for an agent in Austria," he told Reuters in an interview.
Austria cargo sales had been handled by the SAA passenger sales office up to now but a stronger presence was now necessary, he explained.
Els added: "I am still looking for agents in Prague, Sofia and Bucharest as soon as possible.
At the start of 1997, SAA appointed Chapman Freeborn Airmarketing as gsa for Moscow, Budapest and Warsaw and named Airrep Havcilik ve Turizm A.S. as gsa for Turkey, he said.
In Switzerland, SAA Cargo closed its office last year and appointed Tristar Aviation Ltd. as gsa.
- Reuters Air Cargo Newsroom. Tel +44 171 542 7706; Fax: 5017
